subject: Skiing
Fashion and Apparel
lead_paragraph: The founder of Sport Obermeyer started the business in Aspen, Colo., in the 1940s after fashioning a ski parka from a down comforter.
snippet: The founder of Sport Obermeyer started the business in Aspen, Colo., in the 1940s after fashioning a ski parka from a down comforter.
